name: Reboot (itch) (Qazik)
description:
Take control of a CRT on roller skates and to navigate your way through a bowl shaped satellite level in order to beam a transmission back to earth. You must navigate various obstacles around the bowl shaped environment to pick up enough speed to exit the level.

This game requires a controller to play

//link to ost playlist// by Jo Forchheimer and Leo Robles Gonzalez
